name: Quick Draw: ONE SHOT!
description:
Quick Draw: ONE SHOT!

Is a mobile game where 2 players each hold a section of the phone between them, listen for the word "FIRE" then taps the screen as fast as possible!

There are also two 1-player modes:

Campaign mode, can you defeat all 10 challengers?

Practice mode, test your speed!

Art: Mitchell G and Chris I
